trans-unit.source: Defines points of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance about which a tracking service should be notified.
trans-unit.target: Define pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz sobre os quais um serviço de controle deve ser notificado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] During its run time, a workflow instance emits tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Durante o tempo de execução, uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de rastreamento para o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses a TrackingProfile to filter these tracking events and returns tracking records based on this filtering to a tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução usa um TrackingProfile para filtrar esses eventos de rastreamento e retorna registros de rastreamento com base em como a filtragem para um serviço de controle.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of tracking events that can be filtered: activity status events, workflow status events, and user events.
trans-unit.target: Há três tipos de rastreamento de eventos que podem ser filtrados: eventos de status de atividade, eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho e eventos de usuário.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific activity status events; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific workflow status events; and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific user events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>à propriedade <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>para correspondência de eventos de status de atividade específica; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>objetos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A>propriedade para corresponder eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho específico; e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>objetos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>propriedade para corresponder eventos de usuário específico.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure returns the data associated with the tracking event to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that service.
trans-unit.target: Quando um ponto de controle for correspondido, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução retorna os dados associados ao evento de rastreamento para o serviço de controle sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>associados ao serviço.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: The data is returned in either an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> depending on the type of track point that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Os dados são retornados em um um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>dependendo do tipo de ponto de controle que foi correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service implements the methods in the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class to provide the functionality for the runtime tracking infrastructure to request a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with the service, and a TrackingProfile associated with a particular workflow instance or with a particular workflow type.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controle implementa os métodos em teoria <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>classe para fornecer a funcionalidade de tempo de execução do controle de infraestrutura para solicitar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>associado ao serviço e um TrackingProfile associada a uma instância de fluxo de trabalho específico ou com um tipo específico de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service must also implement the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class to provide the channel over which the runtime tracking infrastructure can send tracking records.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controle também deve implementar abstrata <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>classe para fornecer o canal em que a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução pode enviar registros de rastreamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: When the tracking service returns a tracking profile object to the runtime, the workflow starts to execute, and the tracking profile is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando o serviço de acompanhamento retorna um perfil de rastreamento do objeto para o tempo de execução, o fluxo de trabalho começa a executar, e o perfil de rastreamento é serializado.

trans-unit.source: If the serialization of the tracking profile fails, an exception is raised to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Se a serialização do perfil de rastreamento falhar, uma exceção é gerada para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If the exception is not handled, the workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Se a exceção não for manipulada, a instância de fluxo de trabalho será encerrada.

trans-unit.source: The tracking profile can be validated before passing it to the runtime using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de rastreamento pode ser validado antes de passar para o tempo de execução usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A TrackingProfile can be serialized to XML by using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>, which formats the XML according to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um TrackingProfile pode ser serializado para XML usando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>que formata o XML de acordo com o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This provides a convenient format for profile storage and for authoring a profile in a non-programmatic manner.
trans-unit.target: Isso fornece um formato conveniente para armazenamento de perfil e para a criação de um perfil de uma maneira não através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For example, the SQL Tracking Service stores serialized versions of its tracking profiles, as will any tracking service you create based on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o serviço de rastreamento do SQL armazena serializado versões dos seus perfis de controle, assim como qualquer serviço de controle de que você cria com base na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa vazio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: You can add track points to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar pontos de controle para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A>para configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of activity track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter activity status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controle de atividade usado pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para filtrar eventos de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits activity status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> of an activity instance changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de status de atividade para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução sempre que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>das alterações de instância atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the ActivityTrackPoints property to filter these activity status events to determine when to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução usa a propriedade ActivityTrackPoints para filtrar esses eventos de status de atividade para determinar quando enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>para o serviço de acompanhamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to the ActivityTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want the runtime infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>à propriedade ActivityTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potencial da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual você deseja que a infraestrutura de tempo de execução para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match an activity status event for which it should send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, na verdade, não definem um ponto físico em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um conjunto de parâmetros de correspondência que pode ser usado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura para corresponder a um evento de status de atividade para o qual deve enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> de controle</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido muitas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>também pode especificar os dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e retornados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para o qual a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of user track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter user events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controle de usuário usado pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para filtrar eventos de usuário.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer or an activity designer can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instrument a workflow or an activity to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure at specific points during the execution of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de fluxo de trabalho ou um designer de atividade pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>instrumentar um fluxo de trabalho ou uma atividade para emitir os dados no tempo de execução controle infraestrutura em pontos específicos durante a execução de um fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Such an occurrence is called a user event and the data emitted is called user data.
trans-unit.target: Tal uma ocorrência é chamada de um evento de usuário e os dados emitidos são chamados de dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the UserTrackPoints property to filter user events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução usa a propriedade UserTrackPoints para filtrar eventos de usuário para determinar quando enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>para o serviço de acompanhamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to the UserTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>à propriedade UserTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potencial da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual você deseja uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>enviados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match user events.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>não realmente definir um ponto físico em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um conjunto de parâmetros de correspondência que pode ser usado pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para correspondência de eventos do usuário.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido muitas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure always returns the user data associated with a matched <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, but a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução sempre retorna os dados de usuário associados com uma correspondência <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, mas um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>também pode especificar os dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e retornados no registro de controle.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para o qual a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a versão do perfil de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Because of the semantics of profile caching in the workflow runtime engine, if you change the contents of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> you must update Version.
trans-unit.target: Devido a semântica do perfil de cache no mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho, se você alterar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>você deve atualizar a versão.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: If you do not, your updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> may not be loaded by the workflow runtime engine, even if it is returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or sent in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se você não fizer isso, seu atualizada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>não pode ser carregado pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho, mesmo se ele é retornado por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou enviados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>associado com um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to ensure that the updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is loaded by the workflow runtime engine, you should change the Version for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, para garantir que a atualização <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>é carregado pelo mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho, você deve alterar a versão para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: You can then explicitly call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on any appropriate workflow instances, or, depending on your implementation, you can rely on the tracking service to inform the workflow runtime engine of the change.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>em qualquer instância de fluxo de trabalho apropriado ou, dependendo da implementação, você pode contar com o serviço de acompanhamento para informar o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho da alteração.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of workflow track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controle de fluxo de trabalho usado pela infraestrutura de controle de tempo de execução para filtrar eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits workflow status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> occurs indicating that the status of a workflow instance has changed.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução sempre que um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>ocorre indicando que o status de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi alterado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the WorkflowTrackPoints property to filter these workflow status events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução usa a propriedade WorkflowTrackPoints para filtrar esses eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho para determinar quando enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>para o serviço de acompanhamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> to the WorkflowTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>à propriedade WorkflowTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potencial da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual você deseja uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>enviados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>não realmente definir um ponto físico em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um ou mais <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que podem ser usados pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de controle para fazer a correspondência de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido muitas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can also specify any annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>também pode especificar qualquer anotações a serem retornados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos em uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para o qual a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de acompanhamento.
